name: Women's Oversized Sweater
description: Designed with comfort in mind, this sweater features a soft, breathable knit fabric that feels gentle on the skin, perfect for those chilly days.

name: Men's Cotton T-shirt
description: Upgrade your everyday wardrobe with this classic cotton T-shirt, designed for both comfort and style. Made from 100% premium cotton, this T-shirt offers a soft, breathable feel that's perfect for any season.

name: Beach Hat
description: Stay cool and chic under the sun with this stylish beach hat, the perfect accessory for your seaside adventures. Whether you're lounging by the water or taking a stroll along the shore, this beach hat is a must-have for sunny days.

name: Artistic Watch
description: Add a pop of color to your wrist with this elegant pink watch, designed to blend style and functionality seamlessly. Featuring a sleek, modern design, this watch showcases a soft pink strap made from high-quality materials.

name: Comfy Sweatshirt
description: Experience ultimate comfort with this cozy sweatshirt, designed to keep you warm and relaxed on chilly days. The classic crew neck and ribbed cuffs add a timeless touch, while the breathable material ensures all-day comfort.

name: Leather Jacket
description: Elevate your wardrobe with this timeless leather jacket, a perfect blend of edgy style and premium craftsmanship. Whether you're dressing up for a night out or adding a stylish edge to your everyday look, this jacket is a must-have staple for any fashion-forward wardrobe.
